class vizasm.analysis.asm.asmanalyzer.AsmAnalyzerBase.AsmAnalyzerBase(superclass_dict=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for an assembler analyzer. Do not forget to set architecture to analyze !

Parameters :

superclass_dict: dict<ObjcClass, ObjcClass>, optional (default is {}) :

a dictionary holding the base classes as values

output_file: file :

the opened output file

graph: Graph :

the Graph to which the methodcalls will be added

_security_analyzer: SecurityAnalyzer :

the SecurityAnalyzer which does the filtering

Methods

analyze() Analyze the asm file
filtering_enabled() Check if filtering is enabled
get_graph()
get_output_file()
get_security_analyzer()
get_superclass_dict()
log_n_read_superclasses() Read and log the superclass information
read_superclasses() Read the super classes from the sections Segments.SEGMENTS_SUPERCLASS_INFOS.
set_graph(value)
set_output_file(value)
set_security_analyzer(value)
set_superclass_dict(value)

graph¶

graph(Graph) – the Graph to which the methodcalls will be added

log_n_read_superclasses()[source]¶

Read and log the superclass information

output_file¶

output_file(file) – the opened output file

read_superclasses()[source]¶

Read the super classes from the sections Segments.SEGMENTS_SUPERCLASS_INFOS. Use _read_superclasses for implementation!

Returns :

dict<ObjcClass, ObjcClass> :

dict with object as key and the superclass as item
